title: Bloody schemes
creator_credit: The Film Front and Tricontinental Film Center
brief_description: Fourth in a series of nine animated films on the history of Western Civilization. Closely examines the slave trade: John Hawkyns’ role in starting the trade and its subsequent expansion over the next few hundred years. Explains the trade triangle that existed between Africa, America and Europe. Suitable for lower secondary level.
